Uses of Class
crew.CrewMember

  • Packages that use CrewMember 
    Package Description
    crew  
    gui  
    items  
    main  

    • Uses of CrewMember in crew

      Subclasses of CrewMember in crew 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Engineer
      the CrewMember subclass Engineer can repair Ship objects more effectively based on a static modifier.
      class  Investor
      the CrewMember subclass Investor provides a starting bonus to a CrewState's funds and the CrewState's Ship's max shield level.
      class  Medic
      the CrewMember subclass Medic adds a PlagueCure item to a CrewState's inventory at the start of the game.
      class  Robot
      the CrewMember subclass Robot cannot have the CrewMemberEffects HUNGRY, TIRED, or PLAGUED.
      class  Scientist
      the CrewMember subclass Scientist causes the hasScientist() method of any CrewState it is stored in to return true.
      class  Student
      the CrewMember subclass Student has 3 max action points and 50 max health, fullness, and restedness.
      Methods in crew that return CrewMember 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CrewMember CrewMemberFactory.createCrewMember(CrewMemberType type, java.lang.String name)
      creates crew member of a given type with the given name.
      static CrewMember CrewMemberFactory.createCrewMember(int newCrewMemberType, java.lang.String name)
      creates crew member of a given type with the given name.
      Methods in crew that return types with arguments of type CrewMember 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<CrewMember> CrewState.getCrew()
      returns the current crew as a List.
      java.util.List<CrewMember> CrewState.getCrewWithActionPoints(int minAP)
      Returns a list of crew members with action points greater or equal to minAP.
      Methods in crew with parameters of type CrewMember 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CrewState.repairShip(CrewMember crewMember)
      Repairs ship using crew member.
      void CrewState.useItem(ConsumableItem item, CrewMember crewMember)
      Apply item to crew member reducing uses.
      Constructor parameters in crew with type arguments of type CrewMember 
      Constructor and Description
      CrewState(java.util.List<CrewMember> crewMembers, Ship ship)
      constructor creates a CrewState object with a given crew and ship and an empty inventory with 0 funds.
